actions.text: On agreeing to the Souder amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 255 (Roll no. 373).

description: Amendment sought to increase OSHA compliance assistance funding by $23 million and reduce enforcement funding by $21 million and executive administrative funding by $2 million.
purpose: An amendment to increase funds appropriated in the bill for the OSHA compliance assistance program by $23 million and reducing the OSHA account for enforcement by $21 million and the executive administration account by $2 million.
